aliases.name: undo
aliases.command: cls; git clean -xfd && git checkout . && npm i
aliases.description: resets branch to last checked in state

aliases.name: test
aliases.command: cls; ts-node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=./jasmine.json && gittey commit
aliases.description: runs tests and commits on success

aliases.name: docs
aliases.description: if booklisp is installed as a global package then this will regenerate the readme
